PasswordRecoveryEmailSent: Password Recovery email sent to your Inbox.
PasswordRecoveryEmail:
You are receiving this email because you (or someone else) has requested password reset for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:

https://%s.com/reset?t=%s

This Link is valid only for an hour
If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
